entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `TransactionManager.ImplicitDistributedTransactions` #76469
  • Update HTTP/3 docs to 7.0 #76464
    7.0.0
  • Tracking issue for CI build timeouts #76454
  • [HTTP3] Initialize MsQuic only when HTTP3 will be used to send the request. #76445
  • Double(Single).Parse(string) and Double(Single).Parse(ReadOnlySpan<char) throws different exception for null #76442
  • [API Proposal]: Pattern matching with Span<char>/ ReadOnlySpan<char> with specified casing and culture #76441
  • JsonDocument.GetString implementation is not thread safe #76440
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Proxy disconnected on refresh #76438
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QuicError.AddressNotAvailable #76435
  • [Performance] XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive is converting primitive types to string before writing them to the XmlWriter #76434
  • EventPipe sessions can leak the EventPipeThreadSessionState* associated with them #76430
    8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails Bind() on Linux Systems for non-ASCII Passwords #76426
  • The DontFragment SocketOptionName doesn't appear to work on macOS #76422
  • superpmi unit test dependencies build issue #76421
    8.0.0
  • Quic Support Check Throws Exception Breaking ASP.NET core #76420
  • Linguistic apostrophe does not work with DateOnly.TryParseExact #76413
    Future

Closed

  • [mono] crash in class-setup-vtable with re-abstracted covariant returns #76312
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices #72400
    7.0.0
  • ICorDebugThread2.InterceptCurrentException corrupts process in x64 Windows #75762
    7.0.0
  • CurrencySymbol wrong in .Net ^ #76437
  • NetworkInformationException when querying network interfaces in WSL 1 #75883
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 Preview 7 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #73866
    Future
  • JIT: get rid of shortName for phases #74768
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Xml.Linq.Perf_XName (FullPGO) #64626
    7.0.0
  • Generic method constrained by struct & interface can not see readonly modifier #76355
  • [Arm64] addressing mode inefficiencies in Guid:op_Equality(Guid,Guid):bool #35622
    Future
  • Address-exposure of promoted struct fields used by instance methods #76096
    8.0.0
  • Crash with unmanged DLL did not create a StackTrace in Eventlog #75245
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Authenticated ciphers should distigush between mismatched tag and failure #67082
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests failing due to missing a fix in 7.0 packages #76429
  • [API Proposal] QuicError.AlpnInUse #74755
    8.0.0
  • QUIC: QuicListener not reporting address in use correctly #73045
    8.0.0
  • WASM CI failure: Wasm.Browser.Threads.Sample - SharedArrayBuffer is not defined, exit code 71, GENERAL_FAILURE #76331
  • Distributed Transactions (MSDTC) code blocking on disposal of Transaction Scope #76010
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.GetDtcTransaction #75822
  • Get System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests passing with NativeAOT #73145
    8.0.0
  • [arm64] Implement hot/cold splitting #10412
    Future
  • SPMI coreclr test collection issue #75931
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py #76472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    area-Meta
  • Fix DEBUG/non-DEBUG SuperPMI asm diffs #76470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • [mono] Remove unused signature variable #76465
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Reinstate strict prototypes warning #76463
    community-contribution
  • [mbr] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • [Android] Set target SDK version to 31 in AndroidAppBuilder #76461
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76459
    area-Meta
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Ensure NI_Vector256_GetLower has the right simdSize and improve codegen slightly #76456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] EmccExtraExportedRuntimeMethods MSBuild property #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][experiment] perf comparison jobs #76452
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Vector128's Sum and Dot SIMD implementation #76446
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid internal register allocation when possible for PUTARG_SPLIT #76443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: A small CQ improvement for Equals/StartsWith unrolling #76439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] Fix potential division by zero in fgopt.cpp #76424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Explore adding an `ISimdVector<TSelf, T>` interface #76423
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reduce OrderBy overheads for default comparer #76418
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Merged

  • SuperPMI collections: exclude more files/directories #76384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BCrypt for ephemeral RSA on Windows #76277
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Fix distribute free regions #76391
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76323
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Disable gen 1 budget accounting fix for segments #76412
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76393
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix edit and continue in VS with hardware exceptions #76427
    Servicing-approved, os-windows, arch-x64, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Enable logging managed stack trace for AV to event log #76428
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Distributed transaction fixes #76425
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Quick disasm check CI JitStress fix #76417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase timeouts for runtime-dev-innerloop legs #76453
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT: Conversion for opcode conv_u4 is unsigned #76386
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76447
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Remove reliance on deactivated A64 queue #76457
  • Always expose parents of exposed promoted fields #76181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Removing short name column from compphases.h #76030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: increase slop tolerance when computing edge weights #76409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76433
    area-Build-mono
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Add a workaround for issue#76429 to fix CI #76432
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Pass --web-server-use-cop for threading samples #76419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix filtered exceptions when checking for ip forwarding #76383
    area-System.Net
  • Fix edit and continue in VS with hardware exceptions #76401
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Distributed transaction fixes #76310
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove the GenericComPlusCall mechanism #76415
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][jit] For beforefieldinit classes, only field accesses trigger … #76335
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove some dead code from Array.IndexOf #76388
    area-System.Runtime
  • Remove GT_ADDEX and replace with more generalized containment handling #76273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Don't cache the Compilation object in steps in the interop source generators #76474
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Pass local runtime timestamp from git into ci_setup #76396
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement ChaCha20Poly1305 with CryptoKit on macOS #76317
    area-System.Security
  • Tar: Use indexer setter instead of Add on ExtendedAttributes dictionary #76404
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Require global opt-in for distributed transactions #76376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76392
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [metadata] Skip null vtable entries when checking covariant return overrides #76327
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Decommit small free regions when close to OutOfMemory #76216
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76400
    area-GC-mono
  • Add DiagnosticSource.Write<T> API to assist with trimming #76395
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Process primitives in local morph #76155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • global.json: Bump sdk to 7.0.100-rtm.22476.1 to pick up a msbuild fix #76220
    NO-MERGE
  • JIT: Fix too wide loads on arm64 for small structs #76341
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76370
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Align parameter default value resolution between coreCLR, Mono and NativeAOT runtimes #75612
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Remove encoding allocations for System.Security.Xml #76364
    area-System.Security
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Pass-through all `scriptParsed` events, including those with empty URLs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests improvements #76381
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary encoding allocations in System.Private.DataContractSerialization #76366
    area-Serialization
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76387
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Initial green thread prototype #2002
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: cast unsigned ints to floats using uitofp #1994

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new should have a --force-english-output switch #28287

Closed

  • dotnet build/publish uses the implicit SDK RID for RID-specific apps by default #23539
    7.0.1xx
  • NETSDK1191 error when building crossgen2.csproj with RC2 SDK #27985
  • apphost does not respect DOTNET_ROOT #28271

PullRequests

Created

  • don't issue diagnostic when virtual is removed from member in sealed type #28278
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28270
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type (#27648)" #28233
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28238
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2008672 #27667
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    area: common templates
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28263
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: File scoped namespaces #137
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: [call local static functions in base constructor] #3980
    Any Time
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.ArgumentException when binding pattern matching expression #64399
  • DocumentId's need a way to indicate that they refer to a SourceGenerated document. #64397
  • CSharpChangeNamespaceToMatchFolderCodeFixProvider crash when trying to fix Refit interface #64396
  • Incorrect scoped lifetime inference for out locals #64394
    17.5
  • Support ref scoped for parameter declarations #64393
    C# 12.0
  • StackOverflowException in code analyzer for simple class #64392

Closed

  • [LSP] Missing export for project contexts in TS #63844
    Backlog
  • `CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider` crashes with `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` #63732
  • Design a more general test hook solution for runtime feature flags #63223
    17.4
  • Name simplification is missing on System.IntPtr #61419
    17.4
  • Unexpected warning CS0034: Operator '-' is ambiguous on operand of type 'nuint' and 'int' #63860
    17.5
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #63691
    17.5
  • Breaking change for methods with multiple refs #64365
    17.4
  • Change value escape of 'out' parameters to ReturnOnly #64155
  • References within `out` parameter should not be considered as potentially escaping #62094
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32929.264 #64387

PullRequests

Created

  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle assert found during IDE LSIF testing #64413
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE
  • Report warning for unannotated parameters that could be scoped #64410
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Add additional information when we throw an 'unreachable' exception" #64409
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use required members for option types #64405
    Area-IDE
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Use save all, instead trying to get dirty indicator #64403
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Truncate helix work item names to work around helix API issues #64411
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • [LSP] Add missing project context handler for ts #64284
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Better handle methods in partial classes that don't have sequence points #64337
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Fix bug where request contexts were not created serially #64406
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add checks in list wrapping that we don't wrap incomplete separated lists #64407
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add additional information when we throw an 'unreachable' exception #64402
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add tests for local declarations for which we do not support `scoped` keyword. #64401
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Use `TargetFramework.Net70` instead of `RuntimeFlag.ByRefFields` in `CreateCompilation` #64400
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Semantic snippets - don't show in razor documents #64378
    Area-IDE
  • Wait until an analyzer is registered before streaming workspace events over to OOP #64376
    Area-IDE
  • Tweaks to the new unit testing search API. #64395
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64390
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Capture UIntPtr binary operator resolution break #64353
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Add non-strict search flag for legacy unit test providers #64375
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64391
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64388
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Bump patch version to 1 for nuget. #64381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Remove special case in PEModuleSymbol.UseUpdatedEscapeRules for module referencing System.Runtime 7.0 #64361
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64386
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64383
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2007778 #64310
  • Update localization-suggestion.md #64187
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64417
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64416
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update SymbolDisplay API to include scoped for parameters and locals #64285
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Set starting size for changed text builder using old text #64379
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Listen to build manager events to know when build is complete #64366
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core with Angular projec type #44289
  • Changing the date / time format reflect to the CurrentCulture all the time #44286
  • Blazor EditContext OnValidationStageChanged for single FieldIdentifiers #44284
  • WebSockets over HTTP3 #44281
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add a new parameter in PersistentComponentState.RegisterOnPersisting #44280
  • Blazor InputFile read updated file stream will throw InvalidOperationException #44277
  • [Feature] Reference blazor component using partially-qualified namespace #44274
  • Performance issue with PersistentComponentState #44271

Closed

  • Support reverse proxy headers from in the Blazor Dev Server #10136
    Backlog
  • [Components] Forgetting builder.CloseElement hangs the server #8700
    Backlog
  • T of RenderFragment<T> support RenderFragment or Delegate #8364
    Backlog
  • ValidateNever applied to action parameters is not honored #44279
  • Consider adding a HandleError(Task...) method to ComponentBase #7927
    Backlog
  • "Attribute 'Format' was matched by multiple bind attributes" error when a Razor component @inherits a BlazorComponent that has a [Parameter] #5522
    Backlog
  • Authentication fails with new ASP.NET Core hosted Blazor WebAssembly app and Microsoft Identity Platform #44288
  • Failed to load the resource _framework/dotnet.timezones.blat and Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource 'http://localhost/blazorapp/_framework/dotnet.timezones.blat' with computed SHA-256 integrity 'td6j7nNoJkR55GDV/cPfO6LjUxpYB3EV2BZLafX95EM='. The resource has been blocked #44292
  • kestrel web api causes its client app failure of An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #44261
  • Changing the date / time format reflect to the CurrentCulture all the time #44285
  • Use new NTAuth corefx API #10844
    7.0-preview7
  • [Question] DistributedSession CommitAsync #38370
    Backlog
  • Missing of cookieless session management #37978
    Discussions
  • Can't remove attribute from SVG element #43949
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update static file docs and log if WebRootPath is not found #44296
    area-runtime
  • Add schema in launchSettings.json files #44295
    area-mvc
  • Add Azure README, update slnf #44294
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding a custom parameter in PersistentComponentState #44293
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    area-security
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Route tooling: Add Minimal API or MVC parameter fixer #44276
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix route parameter completion provider including names that are already used #44275

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Images aren't reloading correctly in CollectionView #10435
  • Live Visual Tree is missing "Defined in..." arrow for objects #10434
  • Make RegisterRoute a default #10429
  • Auto add using as global #10428
  • Moving the cursor in an Entry field causes crash in iOS 16 #10427
  • .NET 7.0 Button Background Color doesn't update when IsEnabled is changed on Android 7.1.2 #10426
  • .Net Maui can't retrieve embedded resource from assembly with ImageSource.FromResource. (IOS) #10416
  • Line coordinates are not respected #10415
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Animations.Animation doesn't work. #10412
    Backlog

Closed

  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load assembly 'Microsoft.Maui, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken='. #9730
  • Not able to deploy MAUI app to physical iPhone using VS 17.3.5 w/ MAUI 6.0.536 #10422
  • Catalyst Gallery no longer resizes to fit the window #10183
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer cannot find existing images #10380
  • Native Android Application doesn't find resources inside a library referenced through nuget package #10419
  • VS 17.4 Preview 2.1 - System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added. #10408
  • Selecting all the text on a entry for iOS causes crash #10228
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Border StrokeShape Style Setter does not set #10229
    Backlog
  • Picker Items not showing when BindingContext is changed from null to value at runtime #10258
  • Switching MainPage does not work if it is a NavigationPage (similar to #2517) #10271
  • [iOS] Editor.IsEnabled doesn't do anything #6700
    7.0-rc2
  • Maui Blazor No Hot Reload. #10367
  • [CustomControl] HotReload works for nested items that derive from Element but not for items that derive from VisualElement #10390

PullRequests

Created

  • Add min width/height to template styles of select controls #10425

  • Remove unused and potentially conflicting feeds #10423

Merged

  • Update MAUI for .NET 6 version #10424
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure that star rows and columns cannot exceed the available space #10409
    area/layout 🔲
  • Update the diff tool #10421
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Try reduce the ABI breaks #10410
    7.0-rc2
  • Update docs animations #9746

    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10118

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10358
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AddSqlServer should have an `optionsAction` that provide the `IServiceProvider` #29242
  • GroupBy nullable column followed by First() over group returns null record #29240
  • Regression in EF Core 7? Nullable DateTime to Non-nullable DateTime conversion bug when using SqlServer type DateTime instead of DateTime2 #29239

Closed

  • Can IgnoreQueryFilters apply to a single DbSet or Include in a query? #29237
  • EF Core 7 RC produces different translation from EF Core 6 (VB/sqlite) #29222
    7.0.0
  • SqlServerStringAggregateMethodTranslator.cs has Size backwards #29229
    7.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException on Add and Remove with ChangeTrackingStrategy.ChangingAndChangedNotificationsWithOriginalValues #29230
  • ef log some of queries in level of Information #29211
  • One to many plus One to One with same entity #29183
  • Running into Segmentation fault on Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS when using NetTopology and Sqlite. #29167
  • Creating Migration failed by the issue with Geometry type in entity #29067
  • FromSqlInterpolated does not set query parameters correctly for update statement #29241

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Query: Don't fail translation of aggregate when owned navigations #29243

Merged

  • Add parentheses around SQL IS NULL (7.0) #29223
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • Fix result mapping string size in SQL Server string aggregate translator #29231
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix for some minor bugs around JSON mappings #29227
  • Query: Make ExtractJsonProperty generic on return type and resilient … #29236
